productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #51,441 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #243 in Air Freshener Sprays

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep your air smelling fresh with the SimpleAir Duct Fresh Gel HVAC Air Freshener. This engineered odor removal solution is designed to provide a “whole house” odor removal by not simply masking odors but removing them. This air freshener is super simple to use - just place adjacent to your heating/air conditioning system blower so air movement can activate the gel. The effective air-activated formula is non-toxic and neutralizes odors throughout your entire home. For maximum effectiveness, flex container to loosen the gel to rest on the lid. More surface area exposed to air flow maximizes the active odor removal agent. This product provides 90-days of non-toxic odor elimination for your home, office, or anywhere that needs some air freshening. Conquer the toughest odors with the SimpleAir Duct Fresh Gel HVAC Air Freshener! SimpleAir is an innovative line of professional quality products that allow you to quickly and easily handle most repairs and regular home HVAC maintenance yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped with bad smell
reviews.reviewText: We had really bad odor coming from duct unit, this really helped eliminating odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dumbest thing ever
reviews.reviewText: It showed up rock hard (like sidewalk chalk). No scent, no function. A complete waste of money. Negative four stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars These work! But only for a month
reviews.reviewText: Put one in my new cold air return to get rid of the new ductwork smell. It works really well but only for a month. I’ve replaced it exactly every 30 days to keep the odor away. Wish it lasted longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product works well in our HVAC duct system to keep the musty odors eliminated during cooling season. The first time we used it we had to pop the gel out of the container it came in and put it in a larger container so the gel had more surface area exposed to the air flow in our return air duct. After 3 weeks of initial use the gel was almost all gone along with the musty odor and we dropped the remaining gel back into the original container to continue to maintain the system. The gel scent is not strong enough to be noticeable in our home but it has made the air odor more pleasant. We are purchasing additional product to keep maintaining the odor. We are very pleased with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didnt work well for me
reviews.reviewText: Not big enough for the application I needed for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS WORKS ON MILDEWY HVAC ODORS!!!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff WORKS! FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS!!!! Worked wonders in the neglected mildewy smelling hvac system in our new home in Florida! Start with new filters. Use the spray from the same maker GENEROUSLY FIRST in the intake with the fan running to distribute into ducts, then use these on top of the filter in the intake. follow the directions and empty the gel block in a larger plastic container so all sides are exposed or it will not work right! A bit pricey but nothing else worked, duct cleaning is a bait and switch racket especially here in Florida! Try this!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rapidly becoming dissatisfied
reviews.reviewText: I am quickly becoming dissatisfied with the quality of this product. My opinion so far is that the product does clean and deodorize the ductwork. I moved into this home a few years ago and would periodically get a dog smell when the AC or heat turned on. This has gone away since using this product.My problem is with the quality of what I am receiving. I have this item on subscribe and save and the last couple items I have received have had issues. The tubs are only 2/4 filled or less and/or seem to have a lot of liquid in them. This is supposed to be a gel, not a liquid. I understand that products settle but not gel. So there has been a considerable difference from tub to tub. Some tube are totally filled to the top, others are only two thirds filled and in at least two cases, when I opened the tub I was able to see half of the bottom of the tub on one side and there was a lot of liquid in the tub. Generally I open the tub and turn it upside down on top of my intake vents (all of my vents are on the floor. The first one of these, with this issue, I turned over and had the liquid spill all over my floor. I've been more careful since then and found two additional ones with all this liquid and being half empty. I am considering trying another product,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with AC odors
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product fir 3 years now and it works. I also have used the spray to get a better coverage.
I didn't like that it didn't last the 90 days that the write up said.
